intro: Reaction time is a factor in this.

person_situation: You become pregnant by a man who runs off with your husband.
You and your #person# snuck into an empty building through a basement window.
You're at a piano lesson with your teacher.
Your coworker is chosen for a promotion instead of you.
You catch your wife with another man.
You see a homeless person begging for money.
You see a terrified woman running through the street.
person_context: She/He shows you her/his #crawler# collection, plus the killing jar.
She/He shows you her/his expensive artificial #animal#.
person_action: He showed you his, but when it got to be your turn you chickened and ran.
You decide to end things with your partner.
You wonder if everyone is like this.
animal_situation: You’re in a desert walking along in the sand when all of the sudden you look down, and you see #animal.a#.
You remember the #animal# that lived in a bush outside your window.
You have a dream about buying #animal.a#.
animal_context: It moves towards you, in slow motion.
It lays on its back, its belly baking in the hot sun, beating its legs trying to turn itself over, but it can’t, not without your help.
Or was it a spider?  You watched her build a web that whole summer.  Then one day there was a big egg...
You reach down, you flip it over on its back.
You wonder what it's like to decompose.
animal_question: Have you ever harmed an animal?
Have you ever wanted to own a pet?
How do animals make you feel?
Does it remind you of someone?

You find a knife buried under the floorboards.
event_context: You can't stop thinking about visiting #place.a# from your childhood.

A banquet is in progress; the entrée consists of boiled #animal# stuffed with rice.
event_action: It's good to be back, isn't it?
event_question: How will you be able to escape?

object_context: Your #person# likes it so much, he/she hangs it on your bedroom wall.
You're worried your #person# will take it from you.
You wish you could be alone with it forever.

generic_context: Suddenly you realize there’s a #crawler# crawling on your arm.
Suddenly, no one around you can understand what you're saying.
generic_action: You want to feel safe again.
You wish you could leave Earth.
